Description.Details: The smallest rack of Long-Range Missiles, ELRM5s are efficient and tend to serve as harassment weapons. Like all ELRMs, ELRM5s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain with the benefit of a spotter unit. Extended LRMs missile modifier is twice as detrimental when within minimum range and cannot benefit from a Narc Missile Beacon or TAG.

Modes.Name: Hot Load
Modes.Description: Missiles are armed inside the launcher instead of after launching, removing minimum range but having a chance to jam.
